attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let the country vote for the future, the sooner an election is held the quicker the economy will move out of recession, all businesses large or small will know who is in power for the next 5 years and will know what policies are going to be implemented or not. We will all then know where we stand instead of being left in limbo land for another 6 months
